name: Beyond Dusk (vexiinya)
description:
You're taking a minute by yourself by the river, and the next thing you know, there's a ghost behind you. You start to believe he just wants someone to talk to.

There's a total of three endings!

Made for the O2A2 Visual Novel Jam!

Content Warnings:
  • Mentions of death and mourning.
Credits:
  • Sprites, logo, code and writing: me
  • Background: photo by alanrobson
  • Menu background: photo by sourabhkrishna806
  • Music: malictusmusic
  • Sound effect: Worldmaxter

Unfortunately I was limited in the amount of art and design I could create for this project due to a wrist injury halfway through, but it was still a blast to make. Additionally, thank you to my beta testers! <3
